entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Lucien is the youngest of the Meatlump brothers. Find him and take him out.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Lempi is the middle brother. Be careful, he usually keeps some bodyguards around. Find him and take him out.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Hamm is the oldest, and strongest, of the Meatlump brothers. Find him and destroy him.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: The Meatlump's father is still alive! Find him and destroy him and put an end to this madness.
